info.name: [SD] Bulk update user location by email
info.description:
This collection will update the user locations by it's email from a .csv

Author: Hern√°n Aranda (a.k.a. Hernium)

# Prerequisites

Check this article to prepare everything you need: [https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources](https://github.com/hernan-aranda/invgate-implementor-toolbox#how-to-use-this-resources)

# Template

| **Column** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| userEmail | Required. Email of the user that will be updated. |
| locationId | Required. ID of the location where the user will be included. Only one location per row. Multiple rows for the same user are valid. |

Source: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=919297639](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10cN2GcwdoPv8x8-5K6YKi1zdxbbaGsW_IWTTL9CuGnY/view#gid=919297639)

# Execution

1. Set and select the enviroment, or replace the enviroment variables with your constants
2. Create the .csv file. Make sure that your rows are ordered by depth
3. Run the collection using the .csv file
